Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • Logic

  • public class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    Logic class that manipulates the cards.

        public static void shuffleWaste()
        Moves all the cards in the draw pile back into the deck (ONLY IF DECK IS EMPTY).

      • gameEnded

        public static boolean gameEnded()
        Checks to see if the game has been finished. It checks if all the cards in the deck and discard/draw are empty. Then counts the number of shown cards in the remaining piles.
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the game has ended

      • selectCard

        Returns the card selected.
        Parameters:
        p - pile the card is being selected from
        whichCard - which card is selected
        Returns:
        the card selected by the user

                           Pile take,
                           int whichCard)
        Moves the selected pile to the desired location.
        Parameters:
        give - pile the selected pile is moved from
        take - pile the selected pile is moved to
        whichCard - which card is selected
        Returns:
        int the int returns is based on where the pile is moved from
